title: Ruthie and the Hippo's Fat Behind
description: Moving far from friends and familiar places made Ruthie act bratty and miserable. She sassed her parents and disobeyed all the rules. Their darling girl was gone, replaced by a kid with moods as big and ugly as a hippo's fat behind! Then came the magic moment that brought back their darling girl. Suggested age for 5-12
author: Margot E. Finke
